Welcome! ...:It seems as though you forgot who you are! ...:Don't worry! Sometimes we get so caught up in our lives...:that we forget who we really are! ...:Travel back into your life and remember what makes you, well...you!
See those boxes in the top left corner? ...:That's your health! ...:Also, talk to people like me to get memories. You need 2 from each level! ...:Blue boxes will also appear under your health bars! ...:This will indicate how many memories you have!
Enter doors like this by hitting the K key ...!:You can only continue though new levels if you complete the one before!
